title: Ticket #3869: condor_startd DoS via policy evaluator shutdown
description:
KILL / PREEMPT / SUSPEND / CONTINUE policies that evaluate to ERROR or UNDEFINED result in shutdown of the evaluator.

If an administrator uses an attribute defined on a job in any of these policies without protecting the use (checking for both Undefined and Error before use), a user submitting a job can DoS the condor_startd.
